isRegexp
===
> Test if a value is a regular expression.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var isRegexp = require( '@stlib/utils/is-regexp' );
```

### isRegexp( value )

Tests if a `value` is a regular expression.

``` javascript
var value = /\.+/;

var bool = isRegexp( value );
// returns true
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var isRegexp = require( '@stlib/utils/is-regexp' );

console.log( isRegexp( /\.+/ ) );
// returns true

console.log( isRegexp( '/\.+/' ) );
// returns false
```
<!-- </examples> -->
